title: Upload photos on behalf of any VK community
description: A vulnerability was found in the social network VK, which allowed uploading photos on behalf of any community.

title: Publish suggested posts indefinitely in VK
description: This vulnerability allowed an infinite number of times to publish a suggested post to a VK group, while changing the text each time.

title: Play very long in VK Play for 80 rubles
description: This vulnerability allowed to play in VK Play for the cheapest rate for a very long time until the session expired.
